definition: Datong prefecture-level city in Shanxi 山西
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
(used in given names)/variant of 同[tong2]
see 衚衕|胡同[hu2 tong4]
market/city/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Hundreds of coal mines are concentrated around the city Datong.
sentences.chinese: 大同市周围集中着几百个煤矿。

sentences.english: Finally, the paper discuss how to improve the city's WRCC.
sentences.chinese: 最后讨论了提高大同市水资源承载能力的途径。

sentences.english: The farmland irrigation of Datong city in the past was mainly depend on surface water irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 大同市以往的农田灌溉，多以地表水灌溉为主。

sentences.english: This paper explored the emotional intelligence of key senior high school students in Shanghai and Datong, Shanxi province.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究上海市和山西省大同市重点高中生情绪智力。

sentences.english: Datong responsible departments and units attended the friendly celebration General Assembly.
sentences.chinese: 大同市有关部门及友好单位负责人等出席庆祝大会。

sentences.english: Seven schools located in the Datong-san foot of the mountains, 13 kilometers away from the urban area.
sentences.chinese: 学校位于大同市七峰山山脚下，距市区13公里。

sentences.english: The paper reviewed the sewage treatment in the coal-mining area of Datong by…
sentences.chinese: 阐述了应用MBR处理大同市煤矿地区废水的方法。
